Title: DIfmClient
Description: DIfmClient is a WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation) DI.FM streaming radio player, written in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

DIfmClient is a WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation) DI.FM streaming radio player, written in C#.

Check out the CHANGELOG for info about current and planned features and SCREENSHOTS for the latest images.

This is a project for fun I work on in my spare time, so don't expect a fully ready product any time soon.

UPDATE

v1.0.0.2 has been released.
  • JSON API is now fully utilized for channel list and playlist retrieval.
  • Playlists now have a contextual menu that allows for selected tracks to be directly searched in Google and YouTube.
